thread.section_title: TheMirrorCompany.Com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TheMirrorCompany.Com | themirrorcompany.com
thread.title: Jean Oldham:

author: Jean Oldham:
title: Jean Oldham:
text:
The delivery and installation went very well. The two men installing were courteous and knowledgeable; they did a very good job, and it went quickly.
I was disappointed to learn they could not cut out for my outlets because they were too low on the walls. Nobody informed me of this or I would have had contractor place them higher as we just built the studio. The people I contracted with should have informed me of this on the front end. That cost me nearly $500.
